column4: Are Nvidia drivers better than ATI drivers in Linux (for gaming, etc.)?
they are better by leaps and bounds
I'm buying a new comp, and I'm wondering if I'm buying Nvidia 260 or ATI 4870. I currently have the Nvidia 9800 GX2.
i would keep the money and use the 9800
Ok, thx. It's more expensive thoug.
well you can find a cheaper nvidia that will work for linux just fine. unless you dual boot with win of course
Well, I converted the Norwegian price to USD, so it's kind of wrong.. :P
..because the currency is extreme right now
I can say it in NOK.. :P
For many months ago, I bought it for about 15k NOK. Now I'm selling it for about 10.5k NOK.
15k NOK = converted from USD when the currency was extremely low
